MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 18-DEC-2020 10:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the PR8 postcode area of Southport affecting properties in Liverpool Road and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:22 am. Our engineers have attended site and further teams are on their way to the area to investigate and repair the fault and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 9 am. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 7:32 am on 18th December, 2020.
